item.description:
If you have never been, you must come. If you have been, I'm sure you will want to go again. Enjoy the amazing display - Christmas Festival of Lights. Whether you celebrate Christmas or not, you will find it worthwhile.

Taken from their website - described as...
INDESCRIBABLE! SURPASSING! OVERWHELMING! REMARKABLE! WONDERFUL! AWESOME!

Meet at the bistro cafeteria for a quick bite then we'll walk around and visit the spectacular shrine of lights and attractions.

CARPOOL - If you would like to carpool, meet at La Quinta Inn, 24 Beaver Street, Milford. It is right off of 495 at exit 19 next to the Burger King. Meet inside the Inn.

Meet at the Carpool location at 5:30 pm or at the Bistro Cafeteria at La Salette Shrine at 6:30 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Cafeteria/Bistro at 6 pm.
item.name: Holiday Illumination at La Salette Shrine
